name: Sniper Tactical
description: Sniper Tactical is a casual game. Disguised as a shooter, it is actually a semi real-time/turn-based lemmings type puzzle. The gameplay revolves around bringing hostages to safe-zones which in turn is done by shooting different types of enemies in correct order.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: At least 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: Intel i5 or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: At least 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1800 MB available space
